replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
1638349854 发表于 2020-3-26 18:47
这个报错造成卡顿吗。是服务器配置太差了吗
这个当然会。

通常是硬盘性能的问题

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
无视即可，作者咕了
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php? ... 86&pid=14782032

xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-26 18:42
无视即可，作者咕了
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=redirect&goto=findpost&ptid=866686&pid=147820 ...
造成卡顿的不是这个原因吗

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
1638349854 发表于 2020-3-26 18:44
造成卡顿的不是这个原因吗
不是，这个不会导致卡顿

xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-26 18:45
不是，这个不会导致卡顿

replies.author: 结城希亚
replies.txt_content:
1638349854 发表于 2020-3-26 18:47
这个报错造成卡顿吗。是服务器配置太差了吗
卡线程，改spigot就行了。。。

御炎Roinflam 发表于 2020-3-26 18:58
卡线程，改spigot就行了。。。
用的就是spigot呢

replies.author: 结城希亚
replies.txt_content:
1638349854 发表于 2020-3-26 19:53
用的就是spigot呢
spigot.yml

御炎Roinflam 发表于 2020-3-26 19:57
spigot.yml
config-version: 11
settings:
  debug: false
  save-user-cache-on-stop-only: false
  bungeecord: false
  late-bind: false
  user-cache-size: 0
  int-cache-limit: 4096
  item-dirty-ticks: 20
  sample-count: 12
  player-shuffle: 0
  netty-threads: 4
  timeout-time: 60
  restart-on-crash: true
  restart-script: ./start.sh
  attribute:
    maxHealth:
      max: 2048.0
    movementSpeed:
      max: 2048.0
    attackDamage:
      max: 2048.0
  filter-creative-items: true
  moved-too-quickly-multiplier: 10.0
  moved-wrongly-threshold: 0.0625
commands:
  tab-complete: 0
  replace-commands:
  - setblock
  - summon
  - testforblock
  - tellraw
  spam-exclusions:
  - /skill
  log: true
  silent-commandblock-console: false
messages:
  whitelist: You are not whitelisted on this server!
  unknown-command: Unknown command. Type "/help" for help.
  server-full: The server is full!
  outdated-client: Outdated client! Please use {0}
  outdated-server: Outdated server! I'm still on {0}
  restart: Server is restarting
stats:
  disable-saving: false
  forced-stats: {}
advancements:
  disable-saving: false
  disabled:
  - minecraft:story/disabled
world-settings:
  default:
    verbose: true
    merge-radius:
      item: 5.0
      exp: 6.0
    item-despawn-rate: 6000
    view-distance: 5
    arrow-despawn-rate: 1200
    hanging-tick-frequency: 100
    enable-zombie-pigmen-portal-spawns: true
    wither-spawn-sound-radius: 0
    zombie-aggressive-towards-villager: true
    growth:
      cactus-modifier: 80
      cane-modifier: 80
      melon-modifier: 80
      mushroom-modifier: 80
      pumpkin-modifier: 80
      sapling-modifier: 80
      wheat-modifier: 80
      netherwart-modifier: 80
      vine-modifier: 80
      cocoa-modifier: 80
    mob-spawn-range: 4
    random-light-updates: false
    hunger:
      jump-walk-exhaustion: 0.01
      jump-sprint-exhaustion: 0.1
      combat-exhaustion: 0.1
      regen-exhaustion: 5.0
      swim-multiplier: 0.01
      sprint-multiplier: 0.1
      other-multiplier: 0.0
    squid-spawn-range:
      min: 45.0
    entity-activation-range:
      animals: 12
      monsters: 32
      misc: 2
      tick-inactive-villagers: true
    entity-tracking-range:
      players: 36
      animals: 36
      monsters: 48
      misc: 24
      other: 48
    max-tick-time:
      tile: 5
      entity: 50
    ticks-per:
      hopper-transfer: 4
      hopper-check: 1
    hopper-amount: 1
    save-structure-info: true
    max-tnt-per-tick: 20
    nerf-spawner-mobs: false
    dragon-death-sound-radius: 0
    seed-village: 10387312
    seed-feature: 14357617
    seed-monument: 10387313
    seed-slime: 987234911
    max-entity-collisions: 8
